entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1300 metres near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
